articles.description: Dawn King’s dystopian courtroom drama The Trials, dubbed ‘12 Angry Young People’, is part of a programme that also includes European premieres of The Band’s Visit and A Doll’s House, Part 2
articles.content: The Donmar Warehouse in London is to stage a searing dystopian play in which a teenage jury hold their elders to account for crimes against the climate. The Trials, written by British playwright Dawn… [+4596 chars]
